attributes.additional_details: The European single market is the largest in the world, and is a great resource for everyone in the UK. We should be part of it. Freedom of movement, being able to work & study in 27 countries without needing excess documentation/ visas is fantastic. The UK is not as powerful when we are not with our European allies, eg. the UK gov spent £10 per head extra for the Pfizer vaccine compared to the EU!
attributes.background: Rejoin the European Union and become a full member state. Return to how things were before the referendum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552263
